reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 141/08: TAX MATTERS - ANNUAL TIME LIMITS FOR CERTAIN BY-LAWS
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS — ANNUAL TIME LIMITS FOR CERTAIN BY-LAWS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 141/08: TAX MATTERS - ANNUAL TIME LIMITS FOR CERTAIN BY-LAWS
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. (1) The time limits for 2009 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1), 329.1 (2) and 362 (1) of the Act are June 30, 2009. O. Reg. 141/08, s. 1; O. Reg. 146/09, s. 2. (2) Despite subsection (1), the time limits for 2009 for the provisions referred to in that subsection are extended to October 30, 2009 for the Town of Smooth Rock Falls. O. Reg. 371/09, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The time limits for 2009 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1), 329.1 (2) and 362 (1) of the Act are June 30, 2009. O. Reg. 141/08, s. 1; O. Reg. 146/09, s. 2.

(2) Despite subsection (1), the time limits for 2009 for the provisions referred to in that subsection are extended to October 30, 2009 for the Town of Smooth Rock Falls. O. Reg. 371/09, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 141/08, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 141/08, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 141/08, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 141/08, s. 3.
